Docs.summary: The namespace contains types that support the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Runtime in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the language elements in the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Runtime, see [Visual Basic Language Reference](../Topic/Visual%20Basic%20Language%20Reference.md).
